author: Soureek89
body:
In response to JIRA ticket [1] , adding the following two ElecMu paths to be monitored in the topHLTOfflineDQM package. 
HLT_Mu12_TrkIsoVVL_Ele23_CaloIdL_TrackIdL_IsoVL_DZ_v*
HLT_Mu12_TrkIsoVVL_Ele23_CaloIdL_TrackIdL_IsoVL_v*

As explained in [1], these two paths will act as shadow to the following paths. HLT_Mu8_TrkIsoVVL_Ele23_CaloIdL_TrackIdL_IsoVL_DZ_v*
HLT_Mu8_TrkIsoVVL_Ele23_CaloIdL_TrackIdL_IsoVL_v*

[1] https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-961
title: Adding 2 new ElecMU paths to be monitored in topHLTOfflineDQM package for 81X
